description:
Umibozu and Gintoki`s meeting with Kagura`s boyfriend Dai doesn`t go according to plan as he`s revealed to be the prince of Planet Titan. Meanwhile, the new couple`s relationship takes a drastic turn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hageta Otousan to Shiraga no Otousan to Otousan no Megane
Le papa chauve, le papa aux cheveux blancs et les lunettes de papa
My Bald Dad, My Light-Haired Dad, and My Dad`s Glasses
ハゲたお父さんと白髪のお父さんとお父さんのメガネ
